allow:
Bash(echo "Let me check Ryan''s permissions. Please run this SQL query in Supabase and share the output:

SELECT 
  sp.exercises_visibility,
  sp.allowed_exercise_tags,
  p.first_name,
  p.last_name,
  p.app_role
FROM staff_permissions sp
JOIN profiles p ON p.id = sp.staff_id
WHERE sp.staff_id = ''1444c908-d237-4e5d-9e93-a24fb7cd6324'';

This will show Ryan''s current permission settings.")

Bash(npx psql $NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL -c "SELECT recorded_date, recorded_time, COUNT(*) as count FROM blast_swings WHERE athlete_id = ''edf7a6b8-cd9c-4eb5-bb17-8484b2214910'' GROUP BY recorded_date, recorded_time ORDER BY recorded_date DESC, recorded_time DESC LIMIT 20;")
Bash(npx psql $NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL -c "SELECT athlete_id, COUNT(*) as swing_count FROM blast_swings GROUP BY athlete_id;")
